item.title: Environmental Protection is What We Care About!
item.description: Abstract Based on the analyze of the Campaign Period Survey (the CPS) completed in 2008, voters value the environment protection and they seem to expect the leader to pay more attention in environmental issue, along with health care system. Introduction In this repot, I investigated the 2008 CES dataset (Hodgetts and Alexander (2020)), which is short for Canadian Election Study. The CES consists 3 surveys that were conducted during the second half of the election campaign and there were about 4500 eligible voters participated in the survey.
